titles.title: To authorize the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation with appropriate endorsement for employment in the coastwise trade for the vessel LAUDERDALE LADY.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

bill.summary: 10/3/2001--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of Transportation to issue a certificate of documentation for the vessel LAUDERDALE LADY for employment in the coastwise trade.
